description: This file defines authentication service functions for user registration and login, utilizing a user repository, cryptography utilities, and JWT signing utilities.

methods.name: registerUser({ email, name, password })
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, name, and password, returning a JWT token and user profile upon success.

methods.name: loginUser({ email, password })
methods.description: Validates user credentials and returns a JWT token and user profile upon successful login.

ctags.name: registerUser
ctags.pattern: /^export async function registerUser({ email, name, password }) {$/
